Starry nights 
city lights coming down over me
 Skyscrapers 
and stargazers in my head
 Are we we are, 
are we we are the waiting, unknown
 This dirty town is burning down in my dreams
 Lost and found city bound in my dreams
 
 And screaming, 
 Are we we are, are we we are the waiting
 And screaming,
 Are we we are, are we we are the waiting
 
 Forget me nots 
and second thoughts live in isolation
 Heads or tails, fairytales in my mind
 Are we we are, 
are we we are the waiting unknown
 Rage and love, the story of my life
 The Jesus of suburbia is a lie 
 
 And screaming, 
 Are we we are, are we we are the waiting
 And screaming,
 Are we we are, are we we are the waiting unknown
 Are we we are, are we we are the waiting
 And screaming,
 Are we we are, are we we are the waiting unknown
 Are we we are, are we we are the waiting unknown
